name: Guitar Configurator – Your Own Figma Custom Shop!
description:
Create your own custom guitar, try different finishes and neck types, and pair them with an amplifier of your choice!


Hand-illustrated from scratch, entirely in Figma. Have also been playing around with the flexibility of nested components, swap components and variants: this method provides countless choices for your designs without needlessly enumerating your component page with dozens of states and variants for all possible permutations.


Have fun! I hope you will like it – if you did, give me a shout-out, or share this file with your guitar (and design) nerd friends! Take care! :)


My name is Daniel Szabo, and I'm a Lead Product Designer from Budapest, Hungary. Website: dszabo.hu
